numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that the data comes from 2020.
2. The data for the WNBA comes from 2019.
3. The percentage of players of color in the WNBA is 83%.
4. The percentage of players of color in the NBA in 2020 is 83%.
5. The data for the WNBA could have been from 2020.
6. The percentage of players of color in the MLB is 40%.
8. The percentage of players of color in the MLB is less than the percentage of players of color in the NBA.
9. The percentage of players of color in the MLB is less than the percentage of players of color in the WNBA.
10. I wonder why the data for the WNBA in the 2020 season was not available.
11. I wonder why there are much fewer head coaches of color per team than players of color.
12. There are more players than head coaches in a team.
13. Head coaches of color may be discriminated against in these leagues.
14. This data may discourage people of color in my community from pursuing a coaching career.
15. This data shows a lack of diversity among head coaches.
16. This data may encourage people of color to continue working in their sport in order to make a career.
17. The MLB has 40% players of color.
18. The headline is: Diversity in Professional Teams.
